name: Payment and Checkout Vendor Icons
description:
Checkout payment options for eCommerce sites and applications all balanced for size and containers.


Features

  • All Vectors ready for SVG export
  • Standardized for size and alignment
  • Brand Colors
  • Two color themes - Light and Dark


Current Vendors

  • Apple Pay
  • Google Pay
  • Shop Pay
  • Amazon Checkout
  • Prime Checkout
  • Affirm
  • Afterpay
  • Paypal
  • Stripe
  • Visa
  • Mastercard
  • Amex
  • Discover
  • Diners Club
  • JCB
  • Bitcoin
